lead_paragraph: The president ended a meeting in Saudi Arabia with the leaders of six Persian Gulf nations after talks on the American commitment to the region amid a rapprochement with Iran.

byline.original: By MICHAEL D. SHEAR and BEN HUBBARD

headline.print_headline: Obama Calls on Britain to Remain in the E.U.
headline.main: Obama Reassures Persian Gulf Allies About Security

snippet: The president ended a meeting in Saudi Arabia with the leaders of six Persian Gulf nations after talks on the American commitment to the region amid a rapprochement with Iran.
